title: Reproduced Research Projects: Extra Definitions
description: Additional metadata associated with a particular key.

schema_version.description: The version of the schema used to represent the data.

^.+$.description: A key representing a group of objects. 'references' is used for generic keys and are referenced with a '#' prefix.

anyOf.description: The display name of a reference key.
Additional metadata associated with the reference key.

name.description: The display name of a reference key.

short.description: A shortened version of the display name. When specified, the display name will be hidden as a tooltip.

link.description: A URL to the resource representing the key.

versions.description: A list of version keys to their common name. When specified, the version number will be surrounded in parentheses after the common name.

^[\\w.]*\\w+$.description: The common name for the version number.

modifiers.description: A list of modifier keys to their common name. When specified, the modifier will be the suffix of the display name.

^[\\w.]*\\w+$.description: The common name for the modifier.
